title: Bug 118780 - Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder when using aliased columns
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double clicking on the first column name, the original column name is displayed below the expression builder instead of the alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193, in the expression builder, the first column should use the alias name instead of the original name. However, after double clicking on the original name, the alias name is displayed as row['column1'] above the expression builder, while the original name is displayed below it.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder in the software.
2. Select a dataset that has aliased column names.
3. Double click on the first column name.
4. Observe that the alias name is displayed as row['column1'] above the expression builder.
5. Observe that the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder.
